general_description: An image of a dog's face

modifications.instruction: Change the color of the dog's nose to purple
modifications.result_description: The dog's nose is now purple

modifications.instruction: Add a red hat to the dog's head
modifications.result_description: The dog is now wearing a red hat

modifications.instruction: Change the color of the dog's eyes to green
modifications.result_description: The dog's eyes are now green

modifications.instruction: Change the color of the dog's tongue to blue
modifications.result_description: The dog's tongue is now blue
